Class InstructorDashboard

java.lang.Object
com.panotify.ui.instructor.InstructorDashboard
public class InstructorDashboard extends Object
Main dashboard interface for instructor users Provides navigation and content area for various instructor functions such as course management, exam creation, and viewing student results

  • Constructor Details

    • InstructorDashboard

      public InstructorDashboard(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage, Instructor instructor, UserService userService, CourseService courseService, ExamService examService)
      Creates a new InstructorDashboard with the necessary services and user data
      Parameters:
      primaryStage - the JavaFX stage for displaying the dashboard
      instructor - the logged-in instructor user
      userService - service for user-related operations
      courseService - service for course-related operations
      examService - service for exam-related operations
